dialog: So.... let us take a look...
Let's take a look at how you really are, alright?
dialog-porn: Looking at porn on the web?
What are you saying? Not true?
My my, but how about you check what you've done on... {DATE}
Not so confident anymore eh? Hehehe..
dialog-twitter: My GOD, you must be boring to be around
How much time do you REALLY spend on twitter?
Ugh, stay away from me then and get some social interaction from someone as low as you.
dialog-nothing: You truly are pure at heart, interesting.
Though, it could also be the case that you quickly hid everything.
dialog-continue: Despite my doubts in your survival, you may proceed into my domain
